explanations.a: The right answer is (b). A single DOF system has one normal mode.
explanations.b: Correct, the right answer is (b). A 2 DOF system has two normal modes because the system has 2 natural frequency.
explanations.c: The right answer is (b). Multiple DOF system has many normal modes.
explanations.d: The right answer is (b). A 2 DOF system has two normal modes because the system has 2 natural frequency.

questions.question: The equation of motion of a 2DOF system are:

explanations.a: The right answer is (c). The equation of motion for a mass-spring system undergoing SHM is linear.
explanations.b: The right answer is (c). The equation of motion of single DOF is uncoupled because the system has single mass.
explanations.c: Correct, the right answer is (c). The equation of motion of a 2DOF system are coupled because one mass' movement is dependent on another mass' movement. So, both masses are inter-dependent (or coupled) to each other.
explanations.d: The right answer is (c). The equation of motion of a 2DOF system are coupled because one mass' movement is dependent on another mass' movement. So, both masses are inter-dependent (or coupled) to each other.

questions.question: Normal modes and principal modes are same.

explanations.a: Correct, the right answer is (a). Normal modes are also called as principle modes.
explanations.b: The right answer is (a). Normal modes are also called as principle modes.

explanations.a: The right answer is (d). The excitation can be Harmonic but also can be Periodic and random.
explanations.b: The right answer is (d). The excitation can be Periodic but also can be Harmonic and random.
explanations.c: The right answer is (d). The excitation can be random but also can be Periodic and Harmonic.
explanations.d: Correct, the right answer is (d). The excitation can be Harmonic or can be Periodic or can be random.

questions.question: An impulse excitation applied to a system is typically characterized by:

answers.b: Lasts for a short period of time

explanations.a: The right answer is (c). Impulse excitation has High magnitude but also lasts for a short period of time.
explanations.b: The right answer is (c). Impulse excitation can last longer for a short period of time but also has hugh magnitude.
explanations.c: Correct, the right answer is (c). Impulse excitation has a high magnitude of force but last longer for a short period of time.
explanations.d: The right answer is (c). Impulse excitation has a high magnitude of force but last longer for a short period of time.
